overview:
Michael Tribolet is a result driven entrepreneur that has extensive experience in building and selling fast growth high-tech small business, enterprise networks and consumer based businesses. His competency includes administration, business development, customer care, marketing, operations, sales, strategy and overall management of companies. He has over 19 years experience building privately and publicly owned companies with cross border operations.

During his engagements he has been instrumental in developing strategy and then managing the tactical milestones necessary to manage the companyâ€™s growth. He is skilled at achieving the goals he has set forth to the board of directors by insuring the integrity and reliability of reported operations because he delivers corporate objectives efficiently and on time.

SpecialtiesMichael Tribolet can always find ways to drive win/win deals during negotiations while achieving the economical terms needed to make companies financially successful.
